entities.name: doge
entities.description: Doge is a person who is heartbroken and has a reaction to the mention of Aberforth breaking Albus' nose. ("Yes I was," said Doge, through trembling lips, "and a more desperately sad occasion I cannot remember.")

entities.name: albus
entities.description: Albus is a person who has his nose broken by Aberforth. ("Didn't Aberforth break Albus' nose halfway through the service?" )

entities.name: aberforth
entities.description: Aberforth is a person who breaks Albus' nose during a service. ("Didn't Aberforth break Albus' nose halfway through the service?")

entities.name: muriel
entities.description: Muriel is a person who reacts to Doge's reaction with laughter and champagne. (If Doge had looked horriÔ¨Åed before this, it was nothing to how he looked now. Muriel might have stabbed him.)

entities.name: bathilda bagshot
entities.description: Bathilda Bagshot is a person who is mentioned as being friendly with Auntie's mother. ("My mother was friendly with old Bathilda Bagshot," said Auntie)

entities.name: auntie
entities.description: Auntie is a person who mentions her mother's friendship with Bathilda Bagshot. ("My mother was friendly with old Bathilda Bagshot," said Auntie)

relationships.description: Aberforth breaks Albus' nose, which makes Doge heartbroken. ("Didn't Aberforth break Albus' nose halfway through the service?")
Auntie's mother was friendly with Bathilda Bagshot. ("My mother was friendly with old Bathilda Bagshot," said Auntie)
